TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_pwn_silawad, title = silawad, year = 2024, month = November, day = 18, note = {In Wikipedia [Paiwan]}, url = {https://pwn.wikipedia.org/wiki/silawad} }

S.FORM: (kamu nu hulam: ) silawad katayza kisu mizizaw tu saba! lawad (kamu nu hulam: ) nayi' ku lawad nu maku tayza i luma' nu misu. . kasilawadan (kamu nu hulam: ) kasilawadan a tayza kaku i luma' nu misa midang. . malalitin tu ihekalay atu zumaay a natinengan silawad
